body_html:
Hi @tegg89,

Thanks for submitting this PR. As you note, this tutorial needs to be updated for TF version 0.11. We're planning to release a new version in the next few weeks.

In the meantime, I'm not sure there's much value in removing the monitors argument from fit(), as the purpose of the example is to train using monitors. I'm going to close this PR, as we'll address the issues with the example code in a more comprehensive tutorial update.

Thanks again for your submission flagging this issue,
Sanders

body:
Hi @tegg89,

Thanks for submitting this PR. As you note, this tutorial needs to be updated for TF version 0.11. We're planning to release a new version in the next few weeks.

In the meantime, I'm not sure there's much value in removing the monitors argument from `fit()`, as the purpose of the example is to train using monitors. I'm going to close this PR, as we'll address the issues with the example code in a more comprehensive tutorial update.

Thanks again for your submission flagging this issue,
Sanders
